alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:17AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Benton and central Washington Counties through 845 AM CST... At 817 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles south of Springtown to 7 miles west of Strickler. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Lowell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Tontitown... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Greenland... Highfill... Garfield... Gateway... Hobbs State Park... War Eagle... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Elm Springs... Goshen... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
